title: How to clone an existing Hexo site?
excerpt: Hexo is a cool new static site generator that seems to be solving some of the pain points I've faced with Jekyll. However, I noticed the documentation is unclear on how to pull down an existing Hexo site via git and contribute to it. Here is what worked for me.

title: Purescript Reference: Pattern Matching
excerpt: This is a reference guide for how Purescript pattern matching works. Almost all of it was distilled from PureScript by Example by Phil Freeman the original developer of the Purescript compiler. I highly recommend reading it for in depth stuff. This is just for reference.

title: Maps Are Folds
excerpt: To kill time as I waited for my flight in the Yangon international airport, where all great revelations happen, I was working on a coding challenge in Haskell when I stumbled on this discovery.
